projects.title: NUS Statistics and Data Science Mini-Project: Data the Explorer
projects.description: Achieved 2nd place in this 2-hour Exploratory Data Analysis competition, where the challenge was to transform a real-world dataset into comprehensive visual representations.

projects.title: Go Digital ASEAN 2020, a Tech For Good Innovation Challenge
projects.description: Developed a BIOS screen reader for the visually impaired using computer vision as the underlying technology and Flutter as the framework for user interface.

projects.title: IDEATE 2022
projects.description: Designed a prototype of an app to address mental illness in elderly people in Singapore. The app allows them to find friends, sign up for community activities and match up with volunteers.
